V03vinv08_u:2: sāketena hi kasyacid vitaritaṃ marditaṃ (276r1 = GBM 6.864)
V03vinv08_u:3: ca kālena pudgalo mātṛkāpadāny akṛtena viṃśatiḥ karaṇīyena dvādaśikā
V03vinv08_u:6: kardame uṣṇena klāntānāṃ cīvaraṃ tatra sammatam* // //
V03vinv08_u:7: Kaṭhina-v 1. buddho bhagavāṃ śrāvastyāṃ varṣā upagato jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
V03vinv08_u:8_0: tena khalu samayena saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ sākete varṣopagatās trayāṇāṃ vārṣikāṇāṃ māsānām
V03vinv08_u:8_1: atyayāt kṛtacīvarā niṣṭhitacīvarāḥ samādāya pātracīvaraṃ bahutṛṇe bahukardame uṣṇena
V03vinv08_u:8_2: klāmyantaḥ svedaparyākulīkṛtaśarīrā yena śrāvastīṃ tena cārikāṃ carantaḥ śrāvastīm
V03vinv08_u:8_3: anuprāptāḥ atha saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratiśamayya pādau prakṣālya yena
V03vinv08_u:8_4: bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntā upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ
V03vinv08_u:10: Kaṭhina-v 2. dharmatā khalu buddhā bhagavanta āgantukān bhikṣūn anayā pratisaṃmodanayā pratisaṃmodante /
V03vinv08_u:12_0: kutra vā stha varṣā uṣitā iti pratisaṃmodate bhagavān āgantukān bhikṣūn anayā pratisaṃmodanayā
V03vinv08_u:12_1: sukhaṃ sparśaṃ varṣā nayā kuto yūyaṃ bhikṣava etarhy āgacchatha kutra vā stha varṣā
V03vinv08_u:12_2: uṣitāḥ te kathayaṃti sāketād vayaṃ bhadant';
V03vinv08_u:13: etarhy āgacchāma sākete vā sma varṣā uṣitāḥ kaccid yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ sākete sukhaṃ sparśaṃ varṣā uṣitā na vā stha klāntāḥ piṇḍakena tathyaṃ vayaṃ bhadanta (Matsumura 189)
V03vinv08_u:14_0: sāketa sukhaṃ sparśaṃ varṣā uṣitā na vā smaḥ klāntāḥ piṇḍakenāpi tu vayaṃ samādāya
V03vinv08_u:14_1: pātracīvaraṃ bahutṛṇe bahukardame uṣṇena klāmyantaḥ svedaparyākulīkṛtaśarīrā janapadacārikāṃ
V03vinv08_u:16_0: klāmyanti bata me śrāvakāḥ samādāya pātracīvaraṃ bahutṛṇe bahukardame uṣṇena klāmyanti
V03vinv08_u:16_1: svedaparyākulīkṛtaśarīrā janapadacārikāṃ caranto yanv ahaṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ sparśavihārārthaṃ
V03vinv08_u:16_2: dātrīṇāṃ ca deyadharmaparibhogārthaṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ kaṭhinam anujānīyaṃ /
V03vinv08_u:17: yasmāt paṃcānuśaṃsāḥ kaṭhināstare na daśāhaparamaṃ na māsaparamaṃ na rātrivipravāsāḥ sāntarottareṇa cīvareṇa janapadacārikāṃ (Matsumura 190)
V03vinv08_u:21: paraṃparabhojanaṃ na kuleṣv ānimantritacārikā yāvadāptaṃ cīvaraparyeṣaṇaṃ (Matsumura 192)
V03vinv08_u:22: kārtikān māsād yāvat phālguno māso atrāntarāt sāstṛtakaṭhinānāṃ lābha iti viditvā bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma /
V03vinv08_u:23_0: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavo 'nujānāmi bhikṣūṇāṃ sparśavihārārthaṃ dātrīṇāṃ ca deyadharmaparibhogārthaṃ
V03vinv08_u:23_1: varṣoṣitair bhikṣubhiḥ kaṭhinam āstartavyaṃ yasmāt paṃcānuśaṃsāḥ kaṭhine na daśāhaparamaṃ
V03vinv08_u:24: Kaṭhina-v 4. uktaṃ bhagavatā kaṭhinam āstartavyam iti bhikṣavo na jānate katham (Matsumura 193)
V03vinv08_u:27_0: yad varṣoṣitasya saṃghasya cīvaralābhaḥ saṃpadyate tasmād āstartavyaṃ evaṃ ca punar
V03vinv08_u:27_1: āstartavyaṃ pūrvavat* sāmagryam ārocayitavyaṃ idaṃ cīvaraṃ varṣoṣitasya saṃghasya
V03vinv08_u:27_2: cīvaralābhaḥ saṃpannaḥ yadi saṃghasyābhirucitam anena cīvareṇa saṃghasya kaṭhinam (276v1 = GBM 6.865)
V03vinv08_u:29: tataḥ paścād aparasmin divase śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ kṛtvā gaṇḍīm ākoṭya pṛṣtavācikayā bhikṣūṃ (Matsumura 194)
V03vinv08_u:30: samanuyujya sarvasaṃghe sanniṣaṇṇe sannipatite ekena bhikṣuṇā jñaptiṃ kṛtvā karma kartavyam
V03vinv08_u:31: Kaṭhina-v 5. śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃgha idaṃ cīvaraṃ varṣoṣitasya saṃghasya cīvaralābhaḥ saṃpannaḥ saṃghasya kaṭhinam abhirucitaṃ anena cīvareṇa kaṭhinam āstarituṃ /
V03vinv08_u:33_0: purāṇacīvarāṇāṃ apy avipravāso bhaviṣyati prāg eva navakānāṃ sacet saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ
V03vinv08_u:33_1: kṣametānujānīyāt saṃgho yat saṃghaḥ idaṃ cīvaraṃ kaṭhinārthaṃ saṃmanyetānena cīvareṇa
V03vinv08_u:33_2: saṃghasya kaṭhinam āstariṣyati yenāstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsāt* prakrāmantaḥ purāṇacīvarāṇām
V03vinv08_u:33_3: apy avipravāso bhaviṣyati prāg eva navakānām ity eṣā jñaptiḥ //
V03vinv08_u:35_0: Kaṭhina-v 6. śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃgha idaṃ cīvaraṃ varṣoṣitasya saṃghasya cīvaralābhaḥ
V03vinv08_u:35_1: saṃpannaḥ saṃghasya cābhirucitaṃ kaṭhinaṃ kartuṃ tat saṃgha idaṃ cīvaraṃ kaṭhinārthaṃ
V03vinv08_u:35_2: saṃmanyate anena cīvareṇa saṃghasya kaṭhinam āstariṣyati yenāstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsāt
V03vinv08_u:35_3: prakrāmataḥ purāṇacīvarakāṇām apy avipravāso bhaviṣyati prāg eva navakānāṃ (Matsumura 196)
V03vinv08_u:36_0: yeṣām āyuṣmatāṃ kṣamate idaṃ cīvaraṃ kaṭhinārthaṃ saṃmantum anena cīvareṇa saṃghasya
V03vinv08_u:36_1: kaṭhinam āstariṣyati yenāstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsāt prakramataḥ purāṇacīvarakāṇām apy
V03vinv08_u:36_2: avipravāso bhaviṣyati prāg eva navakānāṃ sa tūṣṇīṃ na kṣamate bhāṣantāṃ saṃmataḥ
V03vinv08_u:36_3: saṃghena idaṃ cīvaraṃ kaṭhinārtham anena cīvareṇa saṃghasya kaṭhinam āstariṣyati
V03vinv08_u:36_4: yenāstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsāt* prakrāmataḥ purāṇacīvarakāṇām apy avipravāso bhaviṣyati
V03vinv08_u:36_5: prāg eva navakānāṃ kṣāntam anujñātaṃ saṃghena yasmāt tūṣṇīṃ evam etad dhārayāmi
V03vinv08_u:37_0: Kaṭhina-v 7. tataḥ paścāt kaṭhināstārako bhikṣuḥ saṃmantavyaḥ paṃcabhir dharmaiḥ
V03vinv08_u:37_1: samanvāgataḥ kaṭhināstārako bhikṣur asaṃmato na saṃmantavyaḥ saṃmataś cāvakāśayitavyaḥ
V03vinv08_u:38_0: paścimakāṃ varṣām upagato anyatra varṣoṣitaḥ śikṣādattakaḥ apare api paṃca na saṃmantavyāḥ
V03vinv08_u:38_1: pārivāsika mūlapārivāsika mānāpya mūlamānāpyacāra utkṣiptakaḥ apare paṃca na saṃmantavyā
V03vinv08_u:38_2: cchandād gacchati dveṣāṃ mohād bhayād gacchati āstṛtaṃ cānāstṛtaṃ kaṭhinaṃ na jānāti :
V03vinv08_u:39_0: paṃcabhis tu dharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ kaṭhināstārako bhikṣur asaṃmataś ca saṃmantavyaḥ
V03vinv08_u:39_1: saṃmataś ca nāvakāśayitavyaḥ katamaiḥ paṃcabhiḥ na cchandād gacchati na dveṣān na
V03vinv08_u:39_2: mohān na bhayād gacchati āstṛtānāstṛtaṃ ca kaṭhinaṃ jānāti
V03vinv08_u:40: Kaṭhina-v 8. evaṃ ca punaḥ saṃmantavyaḥ śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ kṛtvā pūrvavad (Matsumura 198)
V03vinv08_u:41: yāvad utsāhayitavyaḥ utsahase tvam evaṃnāmā saṃghasya kaṭhinam āstartum iti saced utsahate tena vaktavyaṃ utsahed iti /
V03vinv08_u:42: tataḥ paścād ekena bhikṣuṇā jñaptiṃ kṛtvā karma kartavyam*
V03vinv08_u:43_0: Kaṭhina-v 9a. śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃgha ayam evaṃnāmā kaṭhināstārako bhikṣur utsahate
V03vinv08_u:43_1: saṃghasya kaṭhinam āstartuṃ sacet saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ kṣametānujānīyāt saṃgho (277r1 = GBM 6.866)
V03vinv08_u:44: yat saṃghaḥ evaṃnāmānaṃ kaṭhināstārakaṃ saṃmanyeta evaṃnāmā kaṭhināstarakaḥ saṃghasya kaṭhinam āstariṣyatīti eṣā jñaptiḥ evaṃ ca karma kartavyaṃ
V03vinv08_u:46_0: Kaṭhina-v 9b. śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃghaḥ ayam evaṃnāmā kaṭhināstāraka utsahe saṃghasya
V03vinv08_u:46_1: kaṭhinam āstartuṃ tat saṃgha evaṃnāmānaṃ kaṭhināstārakaṃ saṃmanyeta ayam evaṃnāmā
V03vinv08_u:46_2: kaṭhināstarakaḥ saṃghasya kaṭhinam āstariṣyati yeṣām āyuṣmatāṃ kṣamate evaṃnāmānaṃ
V03vinv08_u:46_3: kaṭhināstārakaṃ saṃmantuṃ evaṃnāmā kaṭhināstārakaḥ saṃghasya kaṭhinam āstariṣyati
V03vinv08_u:46_4: te tūṣṇīṃ na kṣamate bhāṣantāṃ saṃmataḥ saṃghena evaṃnāmā kaṭhināstārakaḥ saṃghasya
V03vinv08_u:46_5: kaṭhinam āstariṣyati kṣāntam anujñātaṃ saṃghena yasmāt tuṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi
V03vinv08_u:47: Kaṭhina-v 10. tataḥ kaṭhināstārakasya bhikṣor jñaptyā kaṭhinaṃ āstaritavyaṃ (Matsumura 200)
V03vinv08_u:48_0: śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃgha idaṃ cīvaraṃ saṃghena kaṭhinārthaṃ saṃmatam ayaṃ caivaṃnāmā
V03vinv08_u:48_1: kaṭhināstārako bhikṣuḥ saṃmataḥ sacet saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ kṣametānujānīyāt saṃgho
V03vinv08_u:48_2: yat saṃghaḥ idaṃ cīvaraṃ kaṭhinārtham evaṃnāmno bhikṣor anupradadyād ity eṣā jñaptiḥ
V03vinv08_u:49_0: Kaṭhina-v 11. kaṭhināstārakasyāhaṃ bhikṣor āsamudācārikāṃ dharmāṃ prajñapayiṣyāmi
V03vinv08_u:49_1: kaṭhināstārakena bhikṣuṇā kaṭhinena sarvatra pūrvaṃgamena bhavitavyam* dhāvatā vitaratā
V03vinv08_u:49_2: cchindatā sīvatā raṃjayatā antato dvau trayo vā sūcīpadakā dātavyā dvau trayo vā
V03vinv08_u:50: Kaṭhina-v 12. tataḥ paścād āśvayujamāse śuklapakṣapaṃcadaśyāṃ ārocayitavyam* : (Matsumura 201)
V03vinv08_u:52: yuṣmābhiḥ svakasvakāni cīvarāṇi pratyuddhartavyāni iti tataḥ kaṭhināstārakeṇa (Matsumura 202)
V03vinv08_u:53_0: bhikṣuṇā kaṭhinaṃ gandhapuṣpānvitaṃ surabhidhūpadhūpitaṃ kṛtvā śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ
V03vinv08_u:53_1: kṛtvā gaṇḍīm ākoṭya pṛṣtavācikayā bhikṣūn samanuyujya sarvasaṃghe sanniṣaṇṇe sannipatite
V03vinv08_u:53_2: vṛddhānte sthāpayitavyaṃ tato vṛddhānte sthivā kaṭhinaṃ gṛhītvā vaktavyaṃ
V03vinv08_u:54_0: Kaṭhina-v 13. śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃgha idaṃ cīvaraṃ saṃghena kaṭhinaṃ saṃmatam ahaṃ
V03vinv08_u:54_1: caivaṃnāmā bhikṣuḥ kaṭhināstārakaḥ so 'ham evaṃnāmā kaṭhināstārakas tena cīvareṇa
V03vinv08_u:55: evaṃ dvir api tṛr api tata āstīrya saṃghasthavirasya purastāt sthitvā evaṃ vaktavyaṃ samanvāhara sthavira idaṃ cīvaraṃ saṃghena kaṭhinaṃ (Matsumura 203)
V03vinv08_u:56: saṃmatam ahaṃ caivaṃnāmā kaṭhināstārakas tan mayā anena cīvareṇa saṃghasya kaṭhinam āstṛtam iti
V03vinv08_u:57_0: Kaṭhina-v 14. tena vaktavyaṃ sādhv āstṛtaṃ suṣṭhv āstṛtaṃ yo 'tra lābhas cānuśaṃsaś
V03vinv08_u:57_1: ca so 'smākam iti evaṃ dvir api tṛr api yāvat saṃghanavakasya sarvair vaktavyaṃ sādhv
V03vinv08_u:57_2: āstṛtaṃ suṣṭhv āstṛtaṃ yo 'tra lābhaś cānuśaṃsaś ca so 'smākam iti
V03vinv08_u:58_0: Kaṭhina-v 15. kaṭhināstārakeṇa bhikṣuṇā kaṭhinaṃ gṛhītvā na prasrāvakuṭiṃ na varcaskuṭiṃ
V03vinv08_u:58_1: na dhūmāgāraṃ praveṣṭavyaṃ nābhyavakāśe sthātavyaṃ na bahiḥsīmāṃ gantavyaṃ saced
V03vinv08_u:59: kaṭhināstārako bhikṣur yathāprajñaptān āsamudācārikāṃ dharmān na samādāya vartate sātisāro bhavati
V03vinv08_u:60_0: Kaṭhina-v 16. tataḥ kaṭhināstārakena bhikṣuṇā phālgunamāse śuklapakṣapaṃcadaśyāṃ
V03vinv08_u:60_1: punar ārocayitavyaṃ śvā āyuṣmantaḥ kaṭhinam uddhariṣyāmi yūyaṃ svakasvakāni cīvarāṇy adhitiṣṭhateti /
V03vinv08_u:61: yaś ca tatra lābhaḥ saṃpannaḥ sa saṃghena bhājayitavyaḥ //
V03vinv08_u:62: Kaṭhina-v 17. āyuśmān upālī buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchati /
V03vinv08_u:63: katīnāṃ bhadanta kaṭhinam anāstṛtaṃ pañcānām upāliṃ avarṣikasya varṣācchinnakasya paścimakāṃ (277v1 = GBM 6.867)
V03vinv08_u:64: varṣāṃ upagatasya anyatra varṣopagatasya tasmiṃ kaṭhina āstīryamāṇe asaṃmukhībhūtasya /
V03vinv08_u:65: apareṣām api paṃcānām anāstṛtaṃ pārivāsikasya paryuṣitaparivāsasya mānāpyacārikasya caritamānāpyasya śikṣādattakasya ca
V03vinv08_u:68: pañcānām upālin avarṣikasya varṣācchinnakasya paścimakāṃ varṣām upagatasyānyatra varṣopagatasya tasmiṃ kaṭhina astīryamāṇa saṃmukhībhūtasya /
V03vinv08_u:69: apareṣām api pañcānāṃ pārivāsikasya paryuṣitaparivāsasya mānāpyacārikasya caritamānāpyasya śikṣādattakasya ca
V03vinv08_u:70: Kaṭhina-v 19. kātīnāṃ bhadanta naiva lābho nānuśaṃsaḥ paṃcānām upāliṃ adarśanāyotkṣiptakasya apratikarmaṇāyotkṣiptakasya apratinisṛṣṭe /
V03vinv08_u:71: pāpake dṛṣṭigate utkṣiptakasya anyatra varṣoṣitasya bhinne ca saṃghe adharme pākṣikasya
V03vinv08_u:73: Kaṭhina-v 20. saṃbahulā bhikṣavo janapadacārikāṃ carantaḥ corair muṣitās te 'nupūrveṇa śrāvastīm anuprāptā bhikṣubhir dṛṣṭāḥ svāgataṃ svāgataṃ āyuṣmantaḥ kaccit sukhacaryā /
V03vinv08_u:74: kīdṛśī āyuṣmantaḥ sukhacaryā corair muṣitāḥ smaḥ /
V03vinv08_u:75: asmākam āyuṣmantaḥ prabhūto lābhaḥ saṃpannaḥ yadi kaṭhinam uddhriyate cīvarair yuṣmākaṃ saṃvibhāgaṃ kurma iti /
V03vinv08_u:76: etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti bhagavān āha /
V03vinv08_u:77_0: tasmād anujānāmi corair muṣitakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām arthāya kaṭhinam uddhartavyaṃ evaṃ
V03vinv08_u:77_1: ca punar uddhartavyaṃ śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ kṛtvā gaṇḍīm ākoṭya pṛṣtavācikayā bhikṣūn
V03vinv08_u:77_2: samanuyujya sarvasaṃghe sanniṣaṇṇe sannipatite ekena bhikṣuṇā jñaptiṃ kṛtvā karma kartavyam*
V03vinv08_u:78_0: Kaṭhina-v 21. śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃgha yāvad evāsminn āvāse samagreṇa saṃghena kaṭhinam
V03vinv08_u:78_1: āstṛtaṃ saṃbahulāś ca bhikṣavaḥ corair muṣitā āgatāḥ sacet saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ
V03vinv08_u:78_2: kṣametānujānīyāt saṃgho yat saṃghaś corair muṣitakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām arthāya kaṭhinam
V03vinv08_u:78_3: uddhared ity eṣā jñaptiḥ evaṃ ca karma kartavyam*
V03vinv08_u:80_0: Kaṭhina-v 22a. śṛṇotu bhadantāḥ saṃgha yāvad evāsminn āvāse samagreṇa saṃghena kaṭhinam
V03vinv08_u:80_1: āstṛtaṃ saṃbahulāś ca bhikṣavaś corair muṣitakā āgatās tat saṃghaś corair muṣitakānāṃ
V03vinv08_u:80_2: bhikṣūṇām arthāya kaṭhinam uddharati yeṣām āyuṣmatāṃ kṣamate coramuṣitakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām
V03vinv08_u:80_3: arthāya kaṭhinam uddharituṃ te tūṣṇīṃ na kṣamate bhāṣantāṃ uddhṛtaṃ saṃghena coramuṣitakānāṃ
V03vinv08_u:80_4: bhikṣūṇām arthāya kaṭhinaṃ kṣāntam anujñātaṃ saṃghena yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi /
V03vinv08_u:81: Kaṭhina-v 22b. tasmād yo lābhaḥ saṃpannaḥ sa bhājayitavyaḥ bhājite yasyābhipretan tena svakāt pratyaṃśāc cauramuṣitakānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ saṃvibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ // //
V03vinv08_u:85: Kaṭhina-v 23. āyuṣmān upālī buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchati /
V03vinv08_u:86: labhyaṃ bhadanta vitaritena cīvarakeṇa kaṭhinam āstartum* na labhyam upālin* labhyaṃ (Matsumura 208)

V03vinv08_u:88: sannihitacīvareṇa phupphusacīvareṇa kaṭhinam āstartuṃ na labhyam upālin* // //
V03vinv08_u:95: upālī buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchati labhyaṃ bhadanta marditena cīvareṇa kaṭhinam āstartuṃ na labhyam upālin* labhyaṃ bhadanta akālacīvareṇa paudgalikayā saṃghāṭyā (Matsumura 211)
V03vinv08_u:96: uttarāsaṃgena antarvāsena akalpikena cīvareṇa acchinakena ūnapaṃcakena asammatena cīvareṇa asammatena (Matsumura 212)

V03vinv08_u:102_2: kaṭhinam āstartuṃ labhyam upāliṃ ahatacīvareṇa labhyaṃ ahatakalpitena labhyaṃ ātyayikacīvareṇa
V03vinv08_u:103: saṃghāṭyā na labhyaṃ labhyaṃ bhadanta paudgalikayā saṃghāṭyā kaṭhinam āstartuṃ labhyam upālin sacet saṃghe nisṛṣṭā bhavati evam uttarāsaṃgenāntarvāsena // //

V03vinv08_u:200_2: na haiva pratyeṣyāmy nāpi cīvarakaṃ kariṣyāmīti /
V03vinv08_u:202: Kaṭhina-v 61. yathāpi tad bhikṣur āstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsād akṛtacīvaro 'niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ bahiḥsīmāṃ prakrāmati karaṇīyena pratyeṣyāmi cīvaraṃ kariṣyāmīti (Matsumura 229)
V03vinv08_u:203: sa tad ārabhate ārabdhaṃ cāsya naśyati tasya nāśanāntikaḥ kaṭhinoddhāraḥ //
V03vinv08_u:204: Kaṭhina-v 62. yathāpi tad bhikṣur āstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsād akṛtacīvaro 'niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ bahiḥsīmāṃ prakrāmati karaṇīyena pratyeṣyāmi cīvaraṃ kariṣyāmīti /
V03vinv08_u:205: samagreṇa ca saṃghena kaṭhinam uddhṛtaṃ sa śṛṇoti samagreṇa saṃghena kaṭhinam uddhṛtam iti śrutvā cābhyanumodate sādhūddhṛtaṃ suṣṭhūddhṛtam iti /
V03vinv08_u:207: Kaṭhina-v 63. yathāpi tad bhikṣur āstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsād akṛtacīvaro 'niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ bahiḥsīmāṃ prakrāmati karaṇīyena pratyeṣyāmi cīvaraṃ kariṣyāmīti /
V03vinv08_u:208: tasya tatra gatasyaivaṃ bhavati na haiva pratyeṣyāmy api tu cīvaraṃ kariṣyāmīti tasya niṣṭhāpanāntikaḥ kaṭhinoddhāraḥ //
V03vinv08_u:209: yathāpi tatra gatasyety anena viśeṣeṇa niṣṭhāpanāntika uktaḥ evaṃ sanniṣṭhāpanāntikaḥ // 6 //
V03vinv08_u:212_0: Kaṭhina-v 64. yathāpi tad bhikṣur āstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsād akṛtacīvaro 'niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ
V03vinv08_u:212_1: vicikitsāsaṃtatir bahiḥsīmāṃ prakrāmati karaṇīyena kiṃ nu pratyeṣyāmi āhosvin na
V03vinv08_u:212_2: pratyeṣyāmīti tasyaivaṃ bhavati na haiva pratyeṣyāmy api tu cīvaraṃ kariṣyāmīti tasya
V03vinv08_u:213: yathā vicikitsāsantatir ity anena viśeṣeṇa niṣṭhāpanāntika uktaḥ //
V03vinv08_u:218: Kaṭhina-v 65. yathāpi tad bhikṣur āstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsād akṛtacīvaro 'niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ bahiḥsīmāṃ prakrāmati paryeṣaṇāya pratyeṣyāmi cīvaraṃ kariṣyāmīti /
V03vinv08_u:219: tasyaivaṃ bhavati na haiva pratyeṣyāmy api tu cīvaraṃ kariṣyāmīti tasya niṣṭhāpanāntikaḥ kaṭhinoddhāraḥ
V03vinv08_u:220: paryeṣanāyety anena viśeṣeṇa pūrvavad aparā dvādaśikā : // //
V03vinv08_u:221: Kaṭhina-v 66. yathāpi tad bhikṣur āstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsād akṛtacīvaro 'niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ bahiḥsīmāṃ prakrāmati deśānuprekṣī apunarāgamanāya tasya prakramaṇāntikaḥ kaṭhinoddhāraḥ //
V03vinv08_u:222_0: Kaṭhina-v 67.i. yathāpi tad bhikṣur āstīrṇakaṭhinād āvāsād akṛtacīvaro 'niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ
V03vinv08_u:222_1: vicikitsāsantati deśānuprekṣī bahiḥsīmāṃ prakrāmati kin nu pratyeṣyāmi āhosvin na
V03vinv08_u:222_2: pratyeṣyāmīti tasyaivaṃ bhavati na haiva pratyeṣyāmy api tu cīvaraṃ kariṣyāmīti tasyaiva
